de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.job

Class WorkMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.job.AWorkMonitor
      • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.job.WorkMonitor
  • Deprecated. 
    Use NullMonitor, ProgressMonitor, or ConsoleProgressMonitor instead.

    @Deprecated
public final class WorkMonitor
extends AWorkMonitor
    Control object for IJobs. Can be used to check for cancel request, display job progress, and calling intermediate functions.
    Author:
    Sebastian Krieter, Marcus Pinnecke (Feature Interface)
